name: Cyber Watch
description:
Damn dirty Synths! Weird flying Battlebots are invading the world. Support the fear- and faceless hero transmitting the Battlebot-killer-signal by defending your Transmission-Towers with laser turrets, witty booby traps and by putting some good old fashioned plasma bolts in their robo-brains. TLDR; Build, defend, shoot the bastards up!

Credits:

Programming: Martin Beierling

TechArt / 3D: Me :) 

2D / Texturing: Philipp Grzesiak
